raw_snippet: Black Market Prices Most cyber-docs, especially the criminals and chop-shop butchers, won't care if a person is laying on his floor dying. It's pay the price or leave. The price to high? Too bad. The alternative is to find somebody else to do the job or live without the implant (if you can). With luck, the individual will have enough credits for the job, or already have something worthy of trade, like an old artifact, mega-damage weapons or armor, information/secrets, or other commodity that the mob will find valuable. Of course, there are other ways to pay for black market surgery. The crime kingpins deal in drugs, theft, smuggling, extortion, abduc- are common.
